member.summary: Stores an set of methods according to a certain order.

member.param: The set to track changes on

member.summary: Adds the given method to this set if it doesn't already exist in the tracked set and this set.

member.summary: Removes the given method from this set, and from the tracked set if it existed in this set.

member.name: M:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.MethodRewritePattern.MethodRewriteSet.RemoveAll
member.summary: Removes all methods from this set, and their matches in the tracked set.

member.summary: Gets the number of methods stored in this set.

member.summary: Gets an ordered enumerator over this set

member.summary: Gets an ordered enumerator over this set

member.name: P:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.MethodRewritePattern.Prefixes
member.summary: Methods run before the original method is run. If they return false the original method is skipped.

member.name: P:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.MethodRewritePattern.Transpilers
member.summary: Methods capable of accepting one and returing another, modified.

member.name: P:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.MethodRewritePattern.PostTranspilers
member.summary: Methods capable of accepting one and returing another, modified. Runs after prefixes, suffixes, and normal transpilers are applied.

member.name: P:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.MethodRewritePattern.Suffixes
member.summary: Methods run after the original method has run.

member.summary: Should the resulting MSIL of the transpile operation be printed.

member.summary: Types of IL to print to log

member.summary: File to dump the emitted MSIL to.

member.name: P:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.MethodRewritePattern.DumpMode
member.summary: Types of IL to dump to file

member.param: The pattern to track changes on, or null

member.remarks: Patch shims should be singleton, and have one method of signature void Patch(PatchContext)

member.summary: Creates a new patch manager.

member.param: Method to get the pattern for

member.name: M:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.PatchManager.AcquireContext
member.summary: Creates a new used for tracking changes. A call to will apply the patches.

member.name: M:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.PatchManager.FreeContext(Torch.Managers.PatchManager.PatchContext)
member.summary: Frees the given context, and unregister all patches from it. A call to will apply the unpatching operation.

member.name: M:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.PatchManager.FreeAllContexts(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Action{Torch.Managers.PatchManager.PatchContext})
member.summary: Frees all contexts owned by the given assembly. A call to will apply the unpatching operation.
member.param: Assembly to retrieve owned contexts for
Callback to run for before each context is freed, ignored if null.

member.summary: Commits all method decorations into IL.

member.summary: Unregisters and removes all patches, then applies the unpatching operation.

member.summary: Attribute used to decorate methods used for replacement.

member.name: P:Torch.Managers.PatchManager.PatchPriorityAttribute.Priority
member.summary: The priority of this replacement. A high priority prefix occurs first, and a high priority suffix or transpiler occurs last.

member.summary: Creates a reflected event replacer attribute to, for the event defined as eventName in eventDeclaringType, replace the method defined as targetName in targetDeclaringType with a custom callback.

Type the method to remove is declared in
Name of the method to remove
